messages.content: hi, make me 10 mcqs from this document along with their answers

Here are 10 MCQs based on the provided Power-of-Attorney document:

**1. What is the purpose of a Power of Attorney?**
a) To transfer ownership of assets
b) To appoint an attorney to act on behalf of the company
c) To file tax returns
d) To enter into contracts

Answer: b) To appoint an attorney to act on behalf of the company

**2. Who is appointed as the attorney in this Power of Attorney?**
a) Mr. John Doe, a retired Army Staff member
b) Mr. Jane Smith, a Manager
c) Mr. Bob Johnson, a Supervisor
d) The full name and residential address are not mentioned in the document

Answer: d) The full name and residential address are not mentioned in the document (However, it is mentioned that the attorney is presently employed with the company and holding a position of as our attorney)

**3. What acts can be performed by the attorney?**
a) Signing and submitting documents
b) Providing information/responses to the Purchaser
c) Both a and b
d) Neither a nor b

Answer: c) Both a and b

**4. What is required for the Power of Attorney to be valid?**
a) Only one witness
b) Two witnesses with common seal affixed
c) Execution by an authorized representative of the participating firm/company
d) All of the above

Answer: d) All of the above

**5. What documents must be submitted for verification?**
a) Extract of the charter documents and documents such as a resolution/power of attorney
b) Copy of ISO 9001: 2008 Certificate with Scope of "Security Services"
c) Working Experience Sheet (Attached)
d) Financial Capacity form given in document Annex-D

Answer: a) Extract of the charter documents and documents such as a resolution/power of attorney

**6. What is the minimum number of guards/security professionals required?**
a) 100
b) 300
c) 500
d) Not specified

Answer: b) 300

**7. Who must provide documentary proofs of personnel having strong built and healthy physique?**
a) The company
b) The Purchaser
c) The attorney
d) Key Professionals

Answer: a) The company

**8. What is the purpose of Annex-D in this document?**
a) To list Key Personnel
b) To provide Financial Capacity form
c) To provide Supporting documents
d) Both b and c

Answer: d) Both b and c

**9. What certification is required for Security Services?**
a) ISO 9001: 2008 Certificate
b) ISO 14001: 2015 Certificate
c) OHSAS 18001: 2007 Certificate
d) None of the above

Answer: a) ISO 9001: 2008 Certificate with Scope of "Security Services"

**10. What is the purpose of Annexure-A?**
a) To provide details of offices/branches operated internationally and nationally
b) To provide information on Financial Soundness
c) To list Key Professionals and their documents
d) All of the above
